mapper.insert: insert into board_test (bnum, title, content, writer) values ( (select nvl2(max(bnum), max(bnum)+1, 1) from board_test), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.update: update board_test set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writedate=sysdate where bnum=#{bnum}
update board_test set readcnt=readcnt+1 where bnum=#{bnum}
mapper.insert: insert into boardreply_test(rnum, bnum, content, writer) values( (select nvl2(max(rnum), max(rnum)+1, 1) from boardreply_test), #{bnum}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select count(*) from boardreply_test where bnum = #{bnum}
